details.subTitle: Ecommerce Website
details.description: An Ecommerce Website for KLA Construction Equipment LLP. Build to sync with ebay for the source of data.

details.subTitle: Database System
details.description: Our solution is designed specifically for the OPD context in Ethiopia and addresses the RFP’s critical needs: an offline-first Progressive Web App (PWA) for low-bandwidth environments; rule-based duplicate detection that flags cross OPD duplicates without exposing PII; bilingual Amharic/English interfaces and content; role-based access control (RBAC) with 2FA for OPD admins; encrypted storage and audit trails; and deployment on the ZOA-provided Linux VPS with containerized services, automated backups, and a clear handover plan for AAAPD’s long-term ownership.

details.subTitle: Cafe Website
details.description: At Classic Noodle and Burger, we believe in bringing people together through the joy of food and music. Nestled in the heart of Bishoftu, our restaurant offers a delightful fusion of mouthwatering noodles and delectable burgers, perfect for every palate and occasion.

details.subTitle: An Easy Accounting Ledger
details.description: An accounting ledger built with Laravel and Tailwind. It is a simple and easy to use accounting software that helps you manage your business finances. It is built with a clean and modern design and is easy to use.

details.subTitle: A Plant Delivery Service Web App
details.description: Zoe Delivery is a company that sells and delivers various types of plants and pots to customers. It also provides gardeners who can take care of the plants and green areas. The company promises to deliver the plants quickly and seamlessly from the nearest florist to the customer’s doorsteps. The Website is built to attract customers and give them a seemless experience. On top of the stylish presentation it was built with a strong backend CMS(content managment system) based on world class libraries and templates.

details.subTitle: A School Management Web App
details.description: Yeneta Master is a website application that allows schools to manage their students, teachers and other workers. It accomplishes this by helping owners and administrators to regularly check on attendances, grades and disciplines. Yeneta Master is built based on a strong structural design enabling parallal workload. It is also built so that teachers can manage their students while parents can see their children's progress.

details.subTitle: A Church Website
details.description: A Confessional Lutheran Church located in Ethiopia Bishoftu. The Website meant to show the basic beliefs and teachings of the church.

details.subTitle: A Seminary Website
details.description: Maor Lutheran Theological Seminary equips pastors, teachers, and evangelists grounded in Holy Scripture and the Lutheran Confessions.
